headline: Why Is Broadcom Stock Surging Thursday?
summary: Broadcom (NASDAQ:AVGO) capitalized on Wall Street’s artificial intelligence boom Thursday, fueled by billions in chip investments from Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT), Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META), and other technology giants. Broadcom has emerged as one of the biggest beneficiaries of the generative AI boom, carving out a strategic niche in the rapidly evolving chip market. While competitors like Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) offer off-the-shelf, high-performance GPUs, Broadcom focuses on designing custom AI ch

headline: What Does Meta’s $14.2B CoreWeave Deal Mean for the Stock’s Value in 2025?
summary: If you have been watching Meta Platforms' stock lately, you are not alone in wondering if now is the time to buy, hold, or cash in. The company has served up some dramatic price swings, and the only thing that has grown faster than Meta’s share price over the last three years—an eye-popping 419% climb—is the debate around what it’s actually worth right now. Of course, recent weeks have been a bit bumpier. In the past month, Meta’s stock dipped by 2.4%, and it is down 4.2% over the last week...

headline: Andy Cunningham Joins Olatec Therapeutics Board of Directors
summary: Olatec Therapeutics, Inc., a leader in the emerging class of specific NLRP3 inhibitors, today announced that Andy Cunningham had joined its Board of Directors. She succeeds Valentín Campos, who retired from the Board after 9 years of service.

headline: Elevated Materials Appoints Dr. Soonho Ahn to Board of Directors, Deepening Technical Leadership as Company Scales Advanced Battery Solutions
summary: Elevated Materials, a leading innovator in advanced battery technologies, today announced the appointment of Dr. Soonho Ahn to its Board of Directors. A globally respected authority in battery science and engineering, Dr. Ahn brings more than three decades of leadership and technical expertise across the automotive, consumer electronics, and energy storage sectors.
